item.title: My First Hack Week at SUSE
item.description: At the beginning of July, I started to work at SUSE as a member of the YaST team. A wanted, great, and stimulating step in my professional career ğŸ˜Š. Just one week after, I could enjoy the Hack Week 17 which is the time SUSE engineers experiment, innovate & learn interruption-free for a whole week – [SUSE Hack Week homepage] My first Hack Week! So exciting! ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ I was tempted to start learning a new language or framework, but instead I decided to do something related to YaST in order to get more familiar with it and its ecosystem.
